fees.description:
Fee may be charged when reconnecting or reading your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
Additional fees and charges may apply. Please see the standing offer terms and conditions at agl.com.au
Fee may be charged when disconnecting or reading your meter when you move out of a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.

electricityContract.terms: For further information about the terms and conditions applicable to this energy offer, please contact AGL on 131 245 or visit agl.com.au
electricityContract.variation: We may vary these prices no more than once every 6 months. Weâ€™ll publish variations via a newspaper and our website at least 10 business days prior and give you written notice at least 5 business days prior. Other charges may be varied with notice

eligibility.information: This offer applies to customers with an applicable network tariff. For solar feed-in tariff eligibility, or for further information about the terms and conditions applicable to this energy offer, please contact AGL on 131 245 or visit agl.com.au.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: This offer has no contract term.
